General.Name: Anji Foodstuff Co Ltd
General.Description: Anji Foodstuff Co., Ltd engages in the development, production, and sale of condiments and healthy food products in China and internationally. The company offers seasoning powders, including pork ribs flavor king seasoning, big bone soup seasoning, beef flavor seasoning, chicken seasoning powder, fried powder, seafood seasoning, and other products; natural extract seasoning products, such as fresh mushroom seasoning, seafood seasoning, dried scallop seasoning, Yixian seasoning, abalone seasoning, and other products; spices comprising white pepper powder, five-spice powder, and other products; sauces, including oyster sauce, chili sauce, curry seasoning, sparerib sauce, and other products; and flavored clear soups, such as clear chicken, winged, Baohuang, white, and other soups. It also provides health food products comprising probiotics, nutritional supplements, functional beverages, and other solid beverages. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Quanzhou, China.
General.Address: 4-9A, Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Quanzhou, China
